text: Gurjinder Singh (; born 14 September 1997) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a forward for Super League 2 club Ionikos. ==Personal life== Born in Greece, Singh is of Indian descent. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="2"|Platanias |2017–18 |Super League |5||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||5||0 |- |2018–19 |Football League |7||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||7||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !12!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!12!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Greek people of Indian descent Category:Association football forwards Category:Platanias F.C. players
title: Gurjinder Singh (footballer, born 1997)
